data.title: Central Maine arrest log: May 25-31, 2024
data.meta_description: Augusta- and Waterville-area arrests for May 25-31, 2024.
data.text:
IN AUGUSTA, Sunday, May 26, at 11:01 p.m., a 14-year-old juvenile was arrested on a charge of theft by unauthorized taking or transfer.

Monday, May 27, at 11:50 a.m., Zebbie Thomas, 32, of Jay, was arrested on charges of refusing to submit to arrest and a probation hold.

7:09 p.m., Jamario Davispeavy, 31, of Augusta, was arrested on a charge of attaching false license plates.

Tuesday, May 28, at 11:22 p.m., Tiffany Marie Merrill, 38, of Augusta, was arrested on a charge of theft by unauthorized use of property.

Wednesday, May 29, at 7:49 p.m., Amahde Carter, 23, of Augusta, was arrested on five warrants.

Thursday, May 30, at 11:49 a.m., John Bechard, 62, of Augusta, was arrested on a warrant.

IN DRESDEN, Friday, May 24, Benjamin R. Smith, 30, of Dresden, was arrested on a charge of terrorizing.

IN FRANKLIN COUNTY, Saturday, May 25, at 12:26 p.m., India Lee York, 31, of Wilton, was arrested on a warrant.

6:53 p.m., Mark E. Leblanc, 50, of Dixfield, was arrested on two warrants.

11:08 p.m., Brian F. Williams, 65, of Kingfield, was arrested on charges of disorderly conduct and refusing to submit to arrest, physical force.

Sunday, May 26, at 2:55 p.m., Kelly Aura Ross, 38, of Strong, was arrested on a warrant.

Wednesday, May 29, at 5:20 p.m., John D. Ellis Jr., 57, of Wilton, was arrested on charges of refusing to submit to arrest or detention, physical force; harassment; and disorderly conduct, offensive words, gestures.

9 p.m., Roger D. Plourde, 42, of Bowdoinham, was arrested on two warrants.

IN GARDINER, Tuesday, May 21 at 9:01 p.m., Berta Mimi Veno, 40, of Bowdoinham, was arrested on two counts of trafficking in scheduled drugs.

Thursday, May 23, at 9:53 p.m., Brandon Michael Perry, 32, of Dresden, was arrested on a charge of operating under the influence.

IN SOMERSET COUNTY, Friday, May 24, at 11:57 a.m., Shawna Lee Shaw, 40, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of violating conditions of release.

6:23 p.m., James Thomas Lough, 22, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of aggravated assault.

8:38 p.m., Luke D. Silvia, 43, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of violating conditions of release.

Saturday, May 25, at 11:00 p.m., Joni L. Cates, 66, of Solon, was arrested on charges of aggravated driving to endanger, operating under the influence and failing to stop for an officer.

Sunday, May 26, at 2:48 p.m., James Ervin Little, 57, of Pittsfield, was arrested on a charge of violating condition of release.

4:43 p.m., Joshua Raymond Adams, 29, of Solon, was arrested on three charges of attaching false plates and single charges of theft by unauthorized taking or transfer, operating after suspension and violating condition of release.

6:43 p.m., Kyle Richard Lloyd, 24, of Skowhegan, was arrested on two charges of theft by unauthorized taking or transfer; and on charges of burglary, unlawful trafficking in scheduled drugs, aggravated criminal mischief and violating conditions of release.

6:52 p.m., Elijah Nathan-Howard Chubbuck, 27, of Skowhegan, was arrested on two charges of theft by unauthorized taking or transfer and single charges of burglary, operating while license suspended or revoked and aggravated criminal mischief.

7:07 p.m., Katelyn Verbena Henderson, 28, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of unlawful trafficking of scheduled drugs.

7:30 p.m., Kevin George Krenisky, 32, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of criminal trespass.

11:23 p.m., Herbert Sterbenz, 69, of Rockwood, was arrested on a charge of operating under the influence.

Monday, May 27, at 3:03 a.m., Heidi M. Fuller, 39, of Fairfield, was arrested on a charge of violating conditions of release.

4 a.m., Kevin James Singer, 26, of Bingham, was arrested on a charge of domestic violence assault.

Tuesday, May 28, at 4:26 a.m., Sean Roger Walker, 39, of Hampden, was arrested on charges of criminal mischief and domestic violence assault.

4:43 p.m., Adam James Nichols, 28, of Skowhegan, was arrested o a charge of criminal mischief.

11:56 p.m., Mackenzie Margaret Garland, 31, of Madison, was arrested on charges of obstructing government administration and unlawful possession of fentanyl powder.

Thursday, May 30, at 5:01 p.m., Wendy Jean Murray, 52, of St. Albans, was arrested on a charge of burglary.

6:26 p.m., Christopher Mark Fallon, 66, of Skowhegan, was arrested on a charge of violating a protective order.

10:01 p.m., Kathy Lea Perri, 40, of Anson, was arrested on a charge of unlawful possession of a scheduled drug.

Friday, May 31, at 12:11 a.m., Dana Scott Dasilva, 29, of Skowhegan, was arrested on charges of domestic violence criminal threatening and domestic violence assault.

IN WATERVILLE, Friday, May 24, at 2:16 p.m., Gary Oneal, 44, of Clinton, was arrested on a warrant.

6:54 p.m., Michael Austin, 38, of Oakland, was arrested on charges of violating conditions of release and unlawful possession of scheduled drugs.

7:30 p.m., Andrew Zelonis, 43, of Waterville, was arrested on charges of violating conditions of release, refusing to submit to arrest or detention and criminal mischief.

7:50 p.m., Michael Austin, 38, of Oakland, was arrested on charges of unlawful possession and violating conditions of release.

11:30 p.m., Iver Caldwell, 43, of Winterport, was arrested on a charge of violating conditions of release.

Saturday, May 25, at 8:48 a.m., Rocky Romero, 42, of Waterville, was arrested on a warrant and a charge of violating conditions of release and aggravated trafficking of scheduled drugs.

2:22 p.m., Nicholas Shields, 44, of Vassalboro, was arrested on a warrant.

3 p.m., Hong Nguyen, 29, of Augusta, was arrested on two warrants and a charge of violating conditions of release.

Sunday, May 26, at 1:10 a.m., Juan Agramonte, 30, of Farmington, was arrested on a charge of operating under the influence.

Thursday, May 30, at 10:46 p.m., David Alvarez, 38, of Waterville, was arrested on a warrant.

IN WHITEFIELD, Friday, May 24, Alan T. Thornton Jr., 50, of Whitefield, was arrested on a charge of domestic violence assault.

IN WINTHROP, Tuesday, May 28, at 1:07 p.m., Cornelius Howard, 34, of Winthrop, was arrested on charges of domestic violence assault, refusing to submit to arrest, and criminal threatening.

These entries reflect charges filed against individuals. Entries are not criminal convictions.
